title.native: 魔界王子 devils and realist

description:
The story revolves around William, an aristocratic family's progeny with rare intellect. One day, his uncle lost his possessions after his business failed. Fearing that his family's name has been tarnished, William returns home and searches with his family's butler for anything that can be converted into cash. A search of the premises yields an underground room left by an ancestor. In the room is a magical seal, and William unintentionally summons a devil. The summoned devil tells William his name Dantalion, and reveals that William is the designator who can choose the acting ruler of the demon world.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast

tags.name: Foreign

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

node.description:
[Profile](http://zynchro.jp/talent/kakihara.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/charisma.tetsuya.days/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/tetsuya-kakihara/)

Commonly referred to as Kakkii by fans, Kakihara is a voice actor and a singer. As the latter, he is a member of Kiramune (music label) and represents the color of green. He was inspired to become a voice actor by [Yuuji Ueda](https://anilist.co/staff/95058/Yuuji-Ueda)'s performance in the Tokimeki Memorial dating sim game, and moved from Germany to Japan at age 18 to pursue his dream.

Kakihara speaks Japanese, English and German.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Wanderer - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Lloyd Bannings - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
-Asaba Harumasa - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Height:__167 cm  
__Hobbies:__ Billiards, drawing, remaking clothes, singing  
__Skills & Abilities:__ Waking up early    

[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/terashimatakuma/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Terashima_dayo) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2XXSJBvNygj81VPOJmCu-g)

His debut album "New Game" came out on June 6, 2012. Announced marriage with voice actress [Satomi Satou](https://anilist.co/staff/101560/Satomi-Satou) on July 6, 2017.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

**Height:** 187 cm

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%82%E8%A1%8C&label=1&page=3&cell004=&name=%E6%B1%9F%E5%8F%A3%E3%80%80%E6%8B%93%E4%B9%9F&id=18) | [Blog](https://egutaku.exblog.jp) | [Twitter](https://www.twitter.com/egutakuya) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/takuyaeguchi81)

Part of the trio Trignal with fellow seiyuu [Ryouhei Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/96762) and [Tsubasa Yonaga](https://anilist.co/staff/95556). He hosts a radio show for the Kiramune label (currently Trignal no Kira☆Kira Beat R).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kurt Vander - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
- Shoki Ikenami - Persona 5: The Phantom X (VG)
Birth place: Japan
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mielelatte) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/utakoyukihiro/) | [Website](http://77x16.com/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/210380174)

Freelancer originating from [Gainax](https://anilist.co/studio/6/).

Married to fellow animator [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/210380174)

Freelancer originating from [Gainax](https://anilist.co/studio/6/).

Married to fellow animator [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047).

__Height:__ 165 cm
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=82) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/31333.html)

A voice actor currently affiliated with I'm Enterprise. He was honored at the 6th Seiyu Awards as Best New Actor in 2012 and the 10th Seiyu Awards as Best Lead Actor in 2016.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
• Xiao (Genshin Impact)
• Ryker (Rune Factory 5)
• Vision Driver, Laser Raise Riser, and Suel (Kamen Rider Geats)
• Law (Tales Of Arise)
Also the composer for the video game Phantom Kingdom.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ynaritaka)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).
Soutarou Shimizu is an animator.
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dakenmukuinugam)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dakenmukuinugam)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dakenmukuinugam)
**Iizuka Masanori** is a Japanese character and prop designer, animator, animation supervisor and animation director.
Freelance sound effects creator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/325492584) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=tatsuya_yoshihara)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with [Actas](https://anilist.co/studio/60/) where he was attending its internal animation school and debuted as animator at the age of 20. His work has been greatly influenced by contemporary Kanada school animators [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/) and [Hironori Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/103979/). 

He's a precocious talent, debuting as episode director at the age of 21 and as director at the age of 23 with [Arve Rezzle](https://anilist.co/anime/13863/), as part of the Young Animator Training Project.

Married to fellow animator [Kikuko Sadakata](https://anilist.co/staff/105769).
